text: int main ( ) { int t , i ; long long int min , cost ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; while ( t -- ) { min = 9999 ; int n ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; int a [ n ] ; for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { scanf ( "%d" , & a [ i ] ) ; } if ( n < 1 ) { return 0 ; } if ( n == 2 ) { if ( a [ 0 ] > a [ 1 ] ) { cost = a [ 0 ] ; } else { cost = a [ 1 ] ; } } for ( i = 0 ; i < n ; i ++ ) { if ( a [ i ] < min ) { min = a [ i ] ; } } cost = min * ( n - 1 ) ; printf ( "%lld\n" , cost ) ; } }
